body:
Comment 6 by **kim.hendrikse**: 
Actually, I see this issue as well when trying to test the install on an old Fedora
Core 6 machine. It compiles and installs but fails with that error above.

I've attached the stdout and stderr output so you can see it's not pebkac :-)

I didn't have hg or easy_install on that old machine, so I cloned it onto a FC11
machine and rsynced the directory tree to the FC6 machine where I ran all.bash.
However, I did this before any attempt to build it in the FC11 machine so it was clean.

In my case also cat /proc/sys/kernel/hostname simply shows me my expected hostname.
Attachments: 1. trace (478614 bytes) 1. gotest.out (454 bytes)
